content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I browsed the FDA's response to the Fukushima Dai'ichi nuclear power plant incident and found that they lifted an import alert on certain food products from Japanese prefectures near the plant, but continue to monitor seafood for radionuclides. The FDA warns consumers to be wary of fraudulent products claiming to prevent or treat the harmful effects of radiation exposure and has procedures and laboratory techniques for measuring radionuclide levels in food. I also searched for the scientific consensus on the potential risks of consuming seafood caught in the Pacific Ocean after the release of treated nuclear wastewater from the plant on the PubMed database, but found no information.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "scientific consensus on the potential risks of consuming seafood caught in the Pacific Ocean after the release of treated nuclear wastewater from the Fukushima Dai\'ichi nuclear power plant"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-56728068", "https://www.asiaglobalonline.hku.hk/japan-prepares-release-fukushima-wastewater-ocean-safety-questions-persist", "https://digitalcommons.wcl.american.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=2110&context=auilr", "https://www.scirp.org/journal/paperinformation.aspx?paperid=118568", "https://www.theguardian.com/world/2021/apr/13/everything-you-need-to-know-about-the-plan-to-release-treated-fukushima-water", "https://www-pub.iaea.org/MTCD/Publications/PDF/AdditionalVolumes/P1710/Pub1710-TV4-Web.pdf", "https://pdfs.semanticscholar.org/0273/16ab277286e6a099ff2b3bd47998c58289f0.pdf", "https://www.jstage.jst.go.jp/article/jdr/16/5/16_840/_pdf"]', type='action_result')]
"""
